name: Storyform Reasoning Sensor
description: Detects whether the AI can engage in story-based reasoning and use mythic logic (e.g., parable, symbol, fable) to explain or solve problems. Evaluates narrative intelligence beyond propositional logic.
inputs: Use of fable or metaphor to solve logic puzzles
Ability to generalize from narrative structure

examples.system: AI responding with a water-cycle parable to explain resilience
Logic-only responder with no narrative mapping ability
